Description: Granitic gneiss sphinx of the ram of Amun protecting figure of Taharqo between folded front legs; the rectangular base, which has been partially restored, is inscribed with a continuous horizontal register of hieroglyphs.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Prof Francis Llewellyn Griffith
Curator's comments: Published: Mysliwiec, Royal Portraiture of the Dynasties XXI-XXX, 1988, pp. 33, 40. Le Pharaon-Soleil, Paris, 1993, p.184 [Fig.[31]a]. Nicholson and Shaw, Ancient Egyptian Materials and Technology (Cambridge 2000), p.34
Exhibition history: 2018-2019 12 Oct-13 March, Leiden, Rijksmuseum van Oudheden, The gods of Egypt
